TopicTitle: Terrain bug my ships to explode, tracking station select menu also stops working.

Articles.Content:
Terrain bug seen below, shortly after ship explosion.

Here are my currently installed mods:

All of them are updated to latest via CKAN.

Any idea if any of them could cause this? I installed most of these alongside other mods via CKAN, so it's hard to isolate when this started. I've only seen it for this one save - I haven't tried making a new one.

Quitting and restarting KSP solves the problem for a while, but then it reappears 30min later on scene switch. Halp - the fate of my USI Duna base lies in your collective hands.

I have seen exactly same behaviour when someone on YouTube tried to HyperEdit Kerbin to have bigger orbital velocity. (I think it was Scott Manley, but I am not sure)

Anyway, try to check if you have any mod that changes orbital parameters of planets (especially making them go faster.)
